+ Keyboard Shortcut Ctrl-Shift-B

Use [Ctrl-Shift-B] to view your bookmarks,
or select "Goto Bookmark" from the [Navigate Menu].

WikiBookmarks are just a form of WikiDocumentAttribute.

++ See also

	* [Ctrl-Alt-B]
	* KeyBindings
